insert into contents_file
(file_no,contents_no,fname,fupname,fsize) values ( (select nvl(max(file_no),0) +1 file_no from contents_file), #{contentsNo}, #{fname}, #{fupname}, #{fsize} )
(file_no,contents_no,fname,thumb,fsize) values ( (select nvl(max(file_no),0) +1 file_no from contents_file), #{contentsNo}, #{fname}, #{thumb}, #{fsize} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.title, c.keyword, c.likey, c.cnt,cf.thumb FROM CONTENTS C INNER JOIN contents_file CF ON c.contentsno = cf.contents_no WHERE cf.thumb IS NOT NULL
